mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.NAME, A.ASSOCIATION, A.PASSWORD FROM ADMIN A WHERE ASSOCIATION = "쇼핑몰" AND A.ID = #{ id } AND A.PASSWORD = #{ password }
